full_summary:
## Solicitation for Janitorial Services (Morden Manitoba)
### Request for Proposal (RFP) Documentation
- **Contract Title - English**: Janitorial Services (Morden Research and Development Centre)
- **Contract Title - French**: Services de Concièrgie (Centre de recherche et de développement à Morden)
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01010445

### Solicitation Information
- **Publish Date**: October 18, 2022
- **Closing Date**: November 22, 2022 at 3:00 PM CST
- **Site Visit**: Mandatory site visit at the Morden Research and Development Centre on November 1, 2022 at 1:00 PM (Local Morden Time)
- **Duration of Contract**: January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023

### Solicitation Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking a service provider to provide Janitorial Services for the Morden Research and Development Centre. All interested bidders are required to thoroughly review the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents and attendance at the Mandatory Site Visit is mandatory.

### Submissions
Submissions will be accepted via email at [aafc.wscprocurementmanitoba-csoapprovisionnementmanitoba.aac@agr.gc.ca](mailto:aafc.wscprocurementmanitoba-csoapprovisionnementmanitoba.aac@agr.gc.ca) and [desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca](mailto:desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca) until 2:00 PM CST on November 22, 2022. The submissions will not be considered unless all mandatory requirements and forms are submitted as per the instructions contained in the RFP.

### Questions
All questions related to the RFP must be submitted via email to [aafc.wscprocurementmanitoba-csoapprovisionnementmanitoba.aac@agr.gc.ca](mailto:aafc.wscprocurementmanitoba-csoapprovisionnementmanitoba.aac@agr.gc.ca) and [desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca](mailto:desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca) until 12:00 PM CST on November 8, 2022.

### Additional Information
To obtain a copy of the RFP, please visit this link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/e1c
